name: Twin Moons
storyline: Step into a mystical gateway to a place called Halfworld and unravel its myriad mysteries! When your father – a famous researcher who devoted his life to the exploration of enigmatic portals – goes missing, you have no choice but to set out on a journey to a place where universes collide and intersect, a dimensional crossroads known as the Halfworld. Teleport yourself into an out-of-this-world adventure to get to the bottom of mysteries that span realms and defy time and space. Challenge your wit, explore stunning locations and meet striking characters. Do your best to find your father and decode the enigmas of the Twin Moons!
summary: Explore unique worlds, find and use hidden objects, play tricky mini-games, solve challenging quests, and win the battle between Order and Chaos!
